name: Invisible Zombies (EARLY DEMO)
description:
Read me, IMPORTANT!

Your mission - Escape from house;

Hold ESC to exit the game

Right mouse button, to switch between shooting and moving mod

Moving mode
  1. WASD -  Move, Choose options
  2. E - Use items (if there is thought bubble), accept options
Shooting mode
  1. Mouse - Move camera
  2. Left mouse button - Shoot
  3. E - Shoot Scan-Cube (Invisible zombies will be revealed, if it will fly near them)
  4. R - Reload
Tips
  1. Game autosaves between rooms (But all progress is lost if you close the game)
  2. Screen will flicker with red, If zombie is approaches you. It will flick faster if zombie close to you.
  3. Single clip have 7 bullets. There is no bullet counter. Count it by yourself
  4. During reloading old clip is thrown away and remaining bullets inside will not be returned to you.
  5. You can see remaining clips by looking down during shooting mode
  6. Zombies have weak point. Shoot it and inflict extra damage
  7. You can damage fully invisible zombie
  8. Scan-cube may not appear, If you standing too close to a wall
  9. No need to find a weapon. You already have pistol at the start
  10. Out of ammo? Try find some more. Totally out of ammo? Restart the game or try to outrun zombies
  11. Save your ammo!
